A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was not just underwhelming but boring. The plot is poorly laid out and there is a whole arc which has no purpose. The actions of characters in power also make no sense. It seems that the people are aware they are in a movie and it shows. \nThat said the movie is beautiful. One of the best visual movie of the year\, but I came for a story\, not shiny colors.
